body.p: How does data collection and curation relate to the field of data science?

multiple_choice.choice: Data collection and curation is an auxiliary problem and is not a primary concern for data scientists.
Data collection and curation is a complex sub-discipline of data science and is equally important as data analysis .

feedback.p: Incorrect: It is said that data collection and curation takes up over 60% of a data scientist's time in the project execution process. Data collection and curation is priority!
Correct: inaccurate data and data from the wrong source can compromise the solution.
